gbvision.gui.window module¶

class gbvision.gui.window.Window(window_name: str, drawing_pipeline=<gbvision.utils.pipeline.PipeLine object>)¶

Bases: object

an abstract window class

close()¶

closes the window :return:

is_opened() → bool¶
Returns

True is the window is opened, False otherwise

open()¶

opens the window

show_frame(frame) → bool¶

shows the frame on the window :param frame: the frame to show :return: false if the window was closed, true otherwise

gbvision.gui.wrapper_window module¶

Bases: gbvision.gui.window.Window

show()¶

reads from the wrap object and shows the frame until the window is closed :return:

show_and_get_frame()¶

shows one frame and returns it :return: the frame if the window was not closed, None otherwise

show_async()¶

opens the steam video window on another thread
